MIME element (text/plain) 
On Mon, 26 Mar 2007 03:51:30 -0500, cdgmedia@mac.com wrote: 
> ----- Original Message -----  
> From: CDG Media  
> To: abuse@theplanet.com  
> Sent: Monday, March 26, 2007 4:21 AM 
> Subject: Fw: CDGMedia DMCA Complaint - IMPORTANT  
>  
>  
>  
> ----- Original Message -----  
> From: LLOYD COX  
> To: abuse@planet.com  
> Cc: managers@midphase.com  
> Sent: Monday, March 26, 2007 2:28 AM 
> Subject: CDGMedia DMCA Complaint - IMPORTANT  
>  
>  
> Hi, 
>  
> I just talked to a rep from planet.com and was advised to first send
an email to abuse@planet.com 
>  
> I am the copyright holder of pictures being hosted on a website
through a host that buys bandwith from planet. 
>  
> The trace route is as follows: 
>  
> The domain name in question is gamnow.com and the host is midphase.com
Traceroute follows: 
>  
>       1 1 0 0  66.98.244.1 gphou-66-98-244-1.ev1servers.net  
>       2 0 0 0  66.98.241.16 gphou-66-98-241-16.ev1servers.net  
>       3 0 0 0  66.98.240.6 gphou-66-98-240-6.ev1servers.net  
>       4 81 10 2  129.250.10.229 ge-1-13.r04.hstntx01.us.bb.gin.ntt.net

>       5 2 2 1  129.250.2.230 xe-0-1-0.r21.hstntx01.us.bb.gin.ntt.net  
>       6 7 7 7  129.250.4.68 p64-1-3-0.r21.dllstx09.us.bb.gin.ntt.net  
>       7 7 7 7  154.54.11.193 t8-3.mpd01.dfw03.atlas.cogentco.com  
>       8 7 7 7  154.54.6.57 t3-2.mpd01.dfw01.atlas.cogentco.com  
>       9 27 27 30  154.54.5.170 t7-2.mpd01.mci01.atlas.cogentco.com  
>       10 27 27 27  154.54.2.234 t2-3.mpd01.ord01.atlas.cogentco.com  
>       11 27 27 28  154.54.5.18 v3489.mpd01.ord03.atlas.cogentco.com  
>       12 27 28 28  38.112.242.70
midphase_services_inc.demarc.cogentco.com  
>       13 29 Timed out Timed out  205.234.228.37 unknown.ord.scnet.net

>       14 28 28 27  216.246.22.30 unknown.midphase.com  
>  
>  
> There are a total of 271 images that I am the copyright owner of. They
are contained in the following directory - 
> http://www.gamnow.com/free/index.php?level=collection&id=1 
>  
> I have never granted permission to ANY individual or corporation for
use of these photos for any means whatsoever, including, but not limited
to display on a web page. 
>  
> Furthermore, the website in question is in violation of U.S.C. 18 2257
as they are displaying sexually explicit content without proper display
of the custodian of records.  
>  
> To further "show my position". I offer the following: 
>  
> The galleries contained in
http://www.gamnow.com/free/index.php?level=album&id=15 are mere thumbs.
They do not link to fullsize images. These are my images and I believe
the webmaster obviously was unable to obtain the full size images. 
>  
> All the images (while not mine) in the following gallery
http://www.gamnow.com/free/index.php?level=collection&id=3 are
watermarket by different companies and probably stolen content as well. 
>  
> As a first step I am requesting that these images be taken down
immediately. 
>  
> Secondly, I will be filing the necessary papers to gain the identity
of the webmaster in question for future legal proceedings. 
>  
> The display of these images is causing irreversible harm to the
individual whose photos are illegaly being displayed as a certain
individual is presently providing the link to all his friends on various
social networking sites. 
>  
> I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this
notification is accurate and that, for each image contained in the
following directory
http://www.gamnow.com/free/index.php?level=collection&id=1 ,  I  own the
copyright. Failure to take these images down will result in civil
action. 
>  
> Respectfully, 
> Lloyd Cox 
>  
> This message has been sent to both planet.com and midphase hosting.  
 
Kony S 
Customer Service 
www.ThePlanet.com
